predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or below 4.10% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via FRED series DGS10 daily close. Success if any observation dated 2025-10-15 through 2025-11-30 inclusive is <= 4.10%.
monitoring_signals: U.S. CPI/PPI/PCE inflation surprises vs consensus
Treasury quarterly refunding details and net issuance
FOMC communications and dot plot shifts
predictions.rationale: Easing policy tone and slowing growth risks favor a test of lower yields before year-end.

predictions.text: U.S. PPI Final Demand (MoM, SA) for October 2025 will print between 0.0% and 0.3% in the BLS release due by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check BLS PPI news release Table: Percent change from preceding month, seasonally adjusted, Final Demand. October 2025 value must be >= 0.0% and <= 0.3%.
monitoring_signals: Producer survey price intentions (NFIB, regional Feds)
predictions.rationale: Commodity inputs are mixed and demand momentum is moderate; a benign monthly PPI is likely.

predictions.text: Walmart (WMT) Q3 FY2026 U.S. eCommerce net sales growth year-over-year will be between 18% and 26%, per the company’s earnings release published by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Walmart’s Q3 FY2026 press release/presentation. Locate the metric “U.S. eCommerce sales growth” (YoY). Success if the reported YoY percentage is within [18%, 26%].
monitoring_signals: Walmart marketplace SKU growth and site traffic
U.S. retail sales ex-gas and control group
Fulfillment capacity and delivery speed updates
predictions.rationale: Walmart’s ongoing omni/eCommerce momentum and new AI-assisted shopping features support strong double-digit growth.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, China will announce new export licensing restrictions covering at least one rare-earth element, permanent magnet, or other defense-critical mineral category.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmation via an official MOFCOM/State Council/Xinhua notice between 2025-10-15 and 2025-11-30, explicitly adding or tightening export controls/licensing on the specified materials.
monitoring_signals: Chinese state media signaling on critical minerals
Price moves in rare-earth oxides and NdFeB magnets
predictions.rationale: Escalating trade tensions increase the likelihood of targeted Chinese export controls as leverage.

predictions.text: AAA U.S. national average regular gasoline price will print at or below $3.20 per gallon on at least one daily reading by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the daily national average on gasprices.aaa.com or AAA’s API. Success if any daily national average posted between 2025-10-15 and 2025-11-30 is <= $3.20.
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand softness and adequate inventories should pressure retail prices lower into late November.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-15 close to 2025-11-30 close, Consumer Staples (XLP) will underperform Consumer Discretionary (XLY) by at least 2.5 percentage points based on adjusted close percentage change.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Yahoo Finance or equivalent adjusted close data, compute % change for XLP and XLY from 2025-10-15 close to 2025-11-30 close. Success if (XLY% - XLP%) >= 2.5pp.
monitoring_signals: Retail earnings (AMZN, WMT, TSLA) and guidance
predictions.rationale: Easing financial conditions favor cyclicals over defensives into year-end positioning.

predictions.text: U.S. JOLTS quits rate for September 2025 will print between 2.1% and 2.5% in the BLS release due by 2025-11-06.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check BLS JOLTS news release Table for quits rate, total nonfarm, seasonally adjusted, September 2025. Success if reported rate is within [2.1%, 2.5%].
predictions.rationale: Labor demand is cooling gradually; quits should remain near recent trough ranges.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10Y–2Y Treasury yield spread (FRED: T10Y2Y) will close at or above -0.05 percentage points on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via FRED series T10Y2Y daily close. Success if any observation dated 2025-10-15 through 2025-11-30 inclusive is >= -0.05.
monitoring_signals: Shifts in Fed rate path expectations
Treasury supply dynamics and term premium
predictions.rationale: Curve re-steepening risk rises if the market prices earlier cuts or duration demand builds.

predictions.text: ICE Brent crude oil front-month futures will settle at or above $88.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via ICE official settlement prices (or widely cited vendor data). Success if any front-month Brent settlement between 2025-10-15 and 2025-11-30 is >= $88.00.
monitoring_signals: Middle East security developments and supply risks
U.S. inventory draws at Cushing and nationwide
predictions.rationale: Persistent geopolitical risk and potential inventory draws can lift crude toward the upper end of recent ranges.

predictions.text: The S&P 500 Index (ticker: ^GSPC) will close down at least 2.0% day-over-day on at least one UTC trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using official S&P or Yahoo Finance (^GSPC) daily closes, calculate daily % change. Success if any close between 2025-10-15 and 2025-11-30 is <= -2.0% vs the prior trading day.
monitoring_signals: Earnings season surprises and guidance cuts
predictions.rationale: Event risk from earnings, policy, and geopolitics raises odds of a single-session air pocket.
